description: A transaction is a historical record of a cart that has been purchased by a customer. To create a transaction, you post to a cart. The only aspects of a transaction which can be modified are hide_transaction and data_is_fed.

is_test.description: True if this transaction was a test transaction and not run against a live payment gateway.

hide_transaction.description: Set this to true to hide it in the FoxyCart admin.

data_is_fed.description: If the webhook for this transaction has been successfully sent, this will be true. You can also modify this to meet your needs.

transaction_date.description: The date of this transaction shown in the timezone of the store. The format used is ISO 8601 (or 'c' format string for PHP developers).

locale_code.description: The locale code of this transaction. This will be a copy of the store's local_code at the time of the transaction.

customer_first_name.description: The customer's given name at the time of the transaction.

customer_last_name.description: The customer's surname at the time of the transaction.

customer_tax_id.description: If the customer provided a tax_id during checkout, it will be included here.

customer_email.description: The customer's email address at the time of the transaction.

customer_ip.description: The customer's ip address at the time of the transaction.

ip_country.description: The country of the customer's ip address.

total_item_price.description: Total amount of the items in this transaction.

total_tax.description: Total amount of the taxes for this transaction.

total_shipping.description: Total amount of the shipping costs for this transaction.

total_future_shipping.description: If this transaction has any shippable subscription items which will process in the future, this will be the total amount of shipping costs for those items.

total_order.description: Total amount of this transaction including all items, taxes, shipping costs and discounts.

currency_symbol.description: A text symbol representing the currency this transaction was made in.

status.description: Used for transactions processed with a hosted payment gateway which can change the status of the transaction after it is originally posted. If the status is empty, a normal payment gateway was used and the transaction should be considered completed.
